```{r}
pkgload::load_all()
x <- mtcars[1:12, 1:8]
tt(x, output = "html") |> 
  group_tt(
    i = c(
      "I like (fake) hamburgers" = 3,
      "She prefers halloumi" = 4,
      "They love tofu" = 7)) |> 
  cat(file = "~/Downloads/junk.html")
```
